Question.Subject: Internet Safety help! please!!?
Question.Content: does anyone know any good websites on internet safety apart from thinkuknow? help would be greatly appreciated. please help me, thanks xx hugsChloe
Question.ChosenAnswer:
well, im not sure what you mean by internet safety, so firewalls are a part of internet safety, you can find that here http://www.howstuffworks.com/firewall.htm
and this minght be helpful http://videos.howstuffworks.com/computer/computer-internet-security-videos.htm
Howstuffworks is a great site

Answer.Content: Check the link and type that website into the search engine...

Try one of these security software: - Panda Cloud Antivirus Free Edition , - Avira AntiVir Personal - Free Antivirus, - Microsoft Security Essentials, - Malwarebytes' Anti-Malware .

Not sure whether you are looking for international sites or any country specific. I am providing few sites who focuses on Internet Safety for kids.
Here these are: http://www.wiredsafety.org/ http://home.disney.go.com/guestservices/safety http://www.liviaweb.com/safety-news.html http://www.wickedlocal.com/reading/news/education/x441553577/Parker-Middle-School-hosts-Internet-safety-program http://wareseeker.com/free-internet-safety-parental-control/ http://cyber100.in
Hope this helps

here is good site. https://www.mysecurecyberspace.com/
